name: General-Purpose Minimalism - Hide Intra-Site Fluff
description: Strip unnecessary fluff from many websites (supplemental footers, self-promotional content, etc.).
css:

#article-actions, .article-actions,
#articleTools, .articleTools,
#article-tools, .article-tools,
#box_latest_related_news, .box_latest_related_news,
#box_right_networkSites, .box_right_networkSites,
#cbsSMPB, .cbsSMPB,
#CommonBlogHeader, .CommonBlogHeader,
#post_tags, .post_tags
{
    display:  none !important;
}

#backtotop, .backtotop, 
#carouselHighlightsLeft, .carouselHighlightsLeft,

#footer-links, .footer-links, #footer_links, .footer_links,

*/

.header-join, #header-join, .header_join, #header_join, 
.header-about, #header-about, .header_about, #header_about, 
.header-login, #header-login, .header_login, #header_login, 
#inSection, .inSection,
#loomia_body_tab, .loomia_body_tab,
#legal, .legal,
/*

*/
.masthead,

.user-box, #user-box, .user_box, #user_box,
#marketplace, .marketplace, 
#wiSBox, .wiSBox,
#utilities, .utilities,
#ft,
div[id$="NewsFeed"], div[class$="NewsFeed"],
[id$="footer-"], [class$="footer-"], [id$="footer_"], [class$="footer_"]
{ 
    display:  none !important; 
}

#hotTopic, #hotTopics, #tmglHotTopics, 
#horizontal_posts, .horizontal_posts,
#promobar, .promobar,
#related-articles, .related-articles,
#related_links_inline, .related_links_inline,

#top_stories, .top_stories, 
#top_links, .top_links, 
#story_rss, .story_rss,
#story-actions, .story-actions,
#sidebar-related-content, .sidebar-related-content,
.widget.supplemental,
#mwpphu-post-form, .mwpphu-post-form,
#uservoice-feedback-tab, .uservoice-feedback-tab,
#yn-story-related-content, .yn-story-related-content,

}

/*

*/

#cnnFooter,
#legaldisclaimer,
#articleFooter, .articleFooter,

#footer_wrapper, .footer_wrapper, 
#footerWrapper, .footerWrapper, #footer-wrapper, .footer-wrapper, #footer_wrapper, .footer_wrapper, 
#footerWrap, .footerWrap, #footer-wrap, .footer-wrap, #footer_wrap, .footer_wrap,

#foot, .foot
{
    display:  none !important; 
}

blink
{ 
    text-decoration: none !important; 
}


@-moz-document domain("hci-matters.com") {
td.tags, td.t, td.t.tags
  {
    display:  block !important
  }
}

@-moz-document domain("google.com") {
div.foot, div#foot
  {
    display:  block !important
  }
}

@-moz-document domain("squareup.com") {
div.footer
  {
    display:  block !important
  }
}

@-moz-document domain("simplyhired.com") {
div.tools
  {
    display:  block !important
  }
}

@-moz-document domain("linkedin.com") {
div.masthead
  {
    display:  block !important
  }
}


@-moz-document domain("torrentz.com") {
ul.autocomplete
  {
    display:  none !important
  }
}

@-moz-document domain("wired.com") {
#extra_navigation, 
#start_stop_play_index,
#inf_widget
  {
    display:  none !important
  }
}

@-moz-document domain("deals.woot.com") {
#modalContainer
  {
    display:  none !important
  }
}
